meanings.definition: A sauce typically made with mayonnaise, mustard, capers, and herbs, often served with seafood.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious remolade to accompany the grilled salmon.
meanings.sent2: I love the tangy flavor of remolade on my shrimp cocktail.
meanings.sent3: The remolade added a zesty kick to the bland fish fillet.
meanings.sent4: Her homemade remolade was a symphony of flavors dancing on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The creamy remolade was the perfect complement to the crispy calamari.

meanings.definition: To coat or dress food with remolade sauce.
meanings.sent1: She carefully remoladed the chicken before grilling it.
meanings.sent2: The chef will remolade the salad with a tangy dressing.
meanings.sent3: He remoladed the sandwich with a generous amount of sauce.
meanings.sent4: The chef's skilled hands remoladed the dish with precision.
meanings.sent5: The way she remoladed the dish transformed it into a culinary masterpiece.
